TestCase.name: query 1
TestCase.Resource: create materialized view T_no_group_no_count as select sum(v1) as V from t

RwStreamMaterializedView(name=[t_no_group_no_count]) RwStreamProject(v=[$STREAM_NULL_BY_ROW_COUNT($0, $1)]) RwStreamAgg(group=[{}], agg#0=[$SUM0($0)], v=[SUM($1)]) RwStreamExchange(distribution=[RwDistributionTrait{type=SINGLETON, keys=[]}], collation=[[]]) RwStreamAgg(group=[{}], agg#0=[COUNT()], v=[SUM($0)]) RwStreamExchange(distribution=[RwDistributionTrait{type=HASH_DISTRIBUTED, keys=[0]}], collation=[[]]) RwStreamTableSource(table=[[test_schema, t]], columns=[v1])

TestCase.name: query 2
TestCase.Resource: create materialized view T_no_group_has_count as select Count(*), Sum(v1) as V from t

RwStreamMaterializedView(name=[t_no_group_has_count]) RwStreamProject(EXPR$0=[$0], v=[$STREAM_NULL_BY_ROW_COUNT($0, $2)]) RwStreamAgg(group=[{}], agg#0=[$SUM0($0)], EXPR$0=[$SUM0($1)], v=[SUM($2)]) RwStreamExchange(distribution=[RwDistributionTrait{type=SINGLETON, keys=[]}], collation=[[]]) RwStreamAgg(group=[{}], agg#0=[COUNT()], EXPR$0=[COUNT()], v=[SUM($0)]) RwStreamExchange(distribution=[RwDistributionTrait{type=HASH_DISTRIBUTED, keys=[0]}], collation=[[]]) RwStreamTableSource(table=[[test_schema, t]], columns=[v1])

TestCase.name: query 3
TestCase.Resource: create materialized view T_has_group_has_count as select v2, Count(*), Sum(v1) as V from t group by v2

RwStreamMaterializedView(name=[t_has_group_has_count]) RwStreamProject(v2=[$0], EXPR$1=[$1], v=[$3]) RwStreamAgg(group=[{0}], agg#0=[$SUM0($1)], EXPR$1=[$SUM0($2)], v=[SUM($3)]) RwStreamExchange(distribution=[RwDistributionTrait{type=HASH_DISTRIBUTED, keys=[0]}], collation=[[]]) RwStreamAgg(group=[{0}], agg#0=[COUNT()], EXPR$1=[COUNT()], v=[SUM($1)]) RwStreamExchange(distribution=[RwDistributionTrait{type=HASH_DISTRIBUTED, keys=[0]}], collation=[[]]) RwStreamTableSource(table=[[test_schema, t]], columns=[v2,v1])

TestCase.name: query 4
TestCase.Resource: create materialized view T_has_group_no_count as select v2, Sum(v1) as V from t group by v2

RwStreamMaterializedView(name=[t_has_group_no_count]) RwStreamProject(v2=[$0], v=[$2]) RwStreamAgg(group=[{0}], agg#0=[$SUM0($1)], v=[SUM($2)]) RwStreamExchange(distribution=[RwDistributionTrait{type=HASH_DISTRIBUTED, keys=[0]}], collation=[[]]) RwStreamAgg(group=[{0}], agg#0=[COUNT()], v=[SUM($1)]) RwStreamExchange(distribution=[RwDistributionTrait{type=HASH_DISTRIBUTED, keys=[0]}], collation=[[]]) RwStreamTableSource(table=[[test_schema, t]], columns=[v2,v1])

TestCase.name: query 5
TestCase.Resource: create materialized view T_has_three_group as select v1, v2, v3, Sum(v1), AVG(v2), COUNT(v3) as V from t group by v1, v2, v3

RwStreamMaterializedView(name=[t_has_three_group]) RwStreamProject(v1=[$0], v2=[$1], v3=[$2], EXPR$3=[$4], EXPR$4=[/(CAST($5):DECIMAL(28,10) NOT NULL, $6)], v=[$7]) RwStreamAgg(group=[{0, 1, 2}], agg#0=[COUNT()], EXPR$3=[SUM($0)], agg#2=[SUM($1)], agg#3=[COUNT($1)], v=[COUNT()]) RwStreamExchange(distribution=[RwDistributionTrait{type=HASH_DISTRIBUTED, keys=[0, 1, 2]}], collation=[[]]) RwStreamTableSource(table=[[test_schema, t]], columns=[v1,v2,v3])

TestCase.name: query 6
TestCase.Resource: create materialized view T_one_group_avg as select v1, avg(v3) from t group by v1;

RwStreamMaterializedView(name=[t_one_group_avg]) RwStreamProject(v1=[$0], EXPR$1=[/(CAST($2):DOUBLE NOT NULL, $3)]) RwStreamAgg(group=[{0}], agg#0=[$SUM0($1)], agg#1=[SUM($2)], agg#2=[$SUM0($3)]) RwStreamExchange(distribution=[RwDistributionTrait{type=HASH_DISTRIBUTED, keys=[0]}], collation=[[]]) RwStreamAgg(group=[{0}], agg#0=[COUNT()], agg#1=[SUM($1)], agg#2=[COUNT($1)]) RwStreamExchange(distribution=[RwDistributionTrait{type=HASH_DISTRIBUTED, keys=[0]}], collation=[[]]) RwStreamTableSource(table=[[test_schema, t]], columns=[v1,v3])

TestCase.name: query 7
TestCase.Resource: create materialized view T_one_count_star as select count(*) from t;

RwStreamMaterializedView(name=[t_one_count_star]) RwStreamProject(EXPR$0=[$1]) RwStreamAgg(group=[{}], agg#0=[$SUM0($0)], EXPR$0=[$SUM0($1)]) RwStreamExchange(distribution=[RwDistributionTrait{type=SINGLETON, keys=[]}], collation=[[]]) RwStreamAgg(group=[{}], agg#0=[COUNT()], EXPR$0=[COUNT()]) RwStreamTableSource(table=[[test_schema, t]])
